posts.author: Sea_Still
posts.title: Iran orders closure of Strait of Hormuz — putting one-fifth of world’s oil supply at risk

link_metadata.description: Iran’s parliament has voted to close the Strait of Hormuz, the vital shipping channel through which around 20% of the world’s daily oil flows.
